short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience pure speed with every new tab! Custom shortcuts, search, and sleek McLaren Artura wallpapers redefine your browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get ready to shift gears with the McLaren Artura New Tab Extension! With a powerful Google search bar integrated into each new tab, your browsing experience becomes as smooth and fast as a McLaren on the track. Popular site shortcuts are at your disposal, and you can even add custom shortcuts for an experience tailored to your needs, just like the precision of McLaren engineering.

Every new tab opens with a fresh McLaren Artura wallpaper, highlighting the sleek lines and cutting-edge design of this hybrid supercar. There are 10 updated backgrounds that will keep your tabs looking as refined as the car itself.

Whether you're navigating the web or dreaming of the open road, this extension gives you fast, stylish access to your favorite sites, with stunning visuals that reflect the speed and elegance of McLarenâ€™s latest innovation.

Shift your browsing experience into high gear with the McLaren Artura!
